vote.title: Authorize a construction services contract for the construction of public restrooms improvements at the DeGolyer House Complex East Wing in the Dallas Arboretum located at 8525 Garland Road - Ever Group Construction Corp. dba Ever Construction, lowest responsible bidder of two - Not to exceed $735,500.00 - Financing: Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Funds)
